fields.label: Account Type
fields.summary: Tick ONE: • INDIVIDUAL • JOINT “OR”. If JOINT “OR”, fill INVESTOR 2 as well.

fields.label: Last Name (include suffix if any)
fields.summary: Write LAST NAME exactly as on valid ID.

fields.label: First Name
fields.summary: Write FIRST NAME.

fields.label: Middle Name
fields.summary: Write MIDDLE NAME; write N/A if none.

fields.label: Present Address
fields.summary: House/Bldg No., Street, Subdivision/District, Town/City, Province, Country, ZIP.

fields.label: Permanent Address
fields.summary: Fill only if different from Present Address; same full format.

fields.label: Preferred Mailing Address
fields.summary: Tick ONE: • Present Address • Permanent Address.

fields.label: Nationality
fields.summary: Write citizenship/nationality (e.g., Filipino).

fields.label: Date of Birth (MM-DD-YYYY)
fields.summary: Write 2-digit month-day-year (e.g., 03-25-1992).

fields.label: Place of Birth (City/Municipality)
fields.summary: Write city/municipality of birth.

fields.label: Gender
fields.summary: Tick ONE: • Male • Female.

fields.label: Civil Status
fields.summary: Write status (e.g., Single, Married, Widowed, Separated/Annulled, Divorced).

fields.label: Telephone No.
fields.summary: Write landline with area code, or N/A.

fields.label: Mobile No.
fields.summary: Write active mobile number.

fields.label: Email
fields.summary: Write active email for statements/updates.

fields.label: Nature of Work or Business (Code)
fields.summary: Write the NUMBER CODE from Section VI (list on later page). If ‘Others’, write specific description.

fields.label: Tax Identification Number
fields.summary: Write TIN (9–12 digits). Write N/A if none.

fields.label: Type of ID Presented
fields.summary: Write ID type (e.g., PhilID, UMID, Passport, Driver’s License, SSS/GSIS).

fields.label: ID Number
fields.summary: Write the ID number of the ID presented.

fields.label: Name of Employer or Business
fields.summary: Write company/business name; if unemployed/retired/student, write N/A.

fields.label: Source of Funds
fields.summary: Tick all that apply: • Employment • Business • Remittance • Pension/Retirement • Sale of Assets • Others (specify).

sections.title: I. CLIENT PROFILE — INVESTOR 2 (fill only if JOINT “OR”)

fields.label: Last Name (include suffix if any)
fields.summary: Write LAST NAME exactly as on valid ID.

fields.label: First Name
fields.summary: Write FIRST NAME.

fields.label: Middle Name
fields.summary: Write MIDDLE NAME; write N/A if none.

fields.label: Present Address
fields.summary: House/Bldg No., Street, Subdivision/District, Town/City, Province, Country, ZIP.

fields.label: Permanent Address
fields.summary: Fill only if different from Present Address.

fields.label: Preferred Mailing Address
fields.summary: Tick ONE: • Present Address • Permanent Address.

fields.label: Nationality
fields.summary: Write citizenship/nationality.

fields.label: Date of Birth (MM-DD-YYYY)
fields.summary: Write 2-digit month-day-year.

fields.label: Place of Birth (City/Municipality)
fields.summary: Write city/municipality of birth.

fields.label: Gender
fields.summary: Tick ONE: • Male • Female.

fields.label: Civil Status
fields.summary: Write status.

fields.label: Telephone No.
fields.summary: Write landline with area code, or N/A.

fields.label: Mobile No.
fields.summary: Write active mobile number.

fields.label: Email
fields.summary: Write active email.

fields.label: Nature of Work or Business (Code)
fields.summary: Write the NUMBER CODE from Section VI. If ‘Others’, write description.

fields.label: Tax Identification Number
fields.summary: Write TIN (9–12 digits). Write N/A if none.

fields.label: Type of ID Presented
fields.summary: Write ID type used.

fields.label: ID Number
fields.summary: Write the ID number of the ID presented.

fields.label: Name of Employer or Business
fields.summary: Write company/business name; or N/A.

fields.label: Source of Funds
fields.summary: Tick all that apply (same options as Investor 1).

fields.label: Beneficial Owner/s Declaration
fields.summary: Tick the box to declare: “I/We am/are the beneficial owner/s of this investment account.”

fields.label: Investor 1
fields.summary: Tick the box to declare: “I attest that I am not a U.S. Person.”

fields.label: Investor 2 (if any)
fields.summary: Tick the box to declare: “I attest that I am not a U.S. Person.”

fields.label: Process Documents via Fax/Email/Electronic Means
fields.summary: Tick to allow FAMI to process documents sent via fax, email, or digital means (originals still required for new account opening).

fields.label: Marketing & Promotions Consent
fields.summary: Tick to allow FAMI to send marketing/promotional announcements via email, phone call, or SMS.

fields.label: Appoint FAMI as Proxy
fields.summary: Tick to appoint FAMI as proxy to act/vote at meetings per guidelines (valid until withdrawn in writing or you personally attend).

sections.title: VI. NATURE OF WORK OR BUSINESS LIST (Reference for the Code)

fields.label: How to Fill ‘Nature of Work/Business’
fields.summary: Use the NUMBER CODE from this list in the earlier field(s). If selecting ‘Others’, write your specific occupation/business.

fields.label: Investor 1 — Specimen Signatures 1/2/3
fields.summary: Print name, then sign THREE times in the boxes labeled 1, 2, 3.

fields.label: Investor 2 — Specimen Signatures 1/2/3 (if any)
fields.summary: Print name, then sign THREE times in the boxes labeled 1, 2, 3.

fields.label: Acknowledgment Statement
fields.summary: Acknowledge that Terms & Conditions were explained by a FAMI Certified Investment Solicitor/authorized officer.

fields.label: Signature — Investor 1
fields.summary: Sign over printed name; write date (MM/DD/YYYY).

fields.label: Signature — Investor 2 (if any)
fields.summary: Sign over printed name; write date (MM/DD/YYYY).

fields.label: For FAMI Certified Investment Solicitor (Office Use)
fields.summary: Name, CIS License Number, Signature, Date (FAMI personnel only). Leave blank.
